title: How the Establishment Resisted the Abolition of Slavery
itunes:title: How the Establishment Resisted the Abolition of Slavery
itunes:subtitle: Historian Michael Taylor joined me on the podcast to discuss the resistance of the British establishment to the ending of the slave trade.
description:
Historian Michael Taylor joined me on the podcast to discuss the resistance of the British establishment to the ending of the slave trade.
